footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Nahida | Update Date: 11/03/2022 | Editor: Ultimate Noob#2955

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__A Thousand Floating Dreams__ - Her BiS weapon, increasing her personal and team damage
__Kagura's Verity__ - Very close behind A Thousand Floating Dreams, Nahida is able to fully capitalize it's passive

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Solar Pearl__ - A great stat stick for On-Field Nahida
__Mappa Mare__ - Nahida is able to use it's passive effectively
__Magic Guide__ - If you can maintain passive, easily one of her best weapons, beating some 5-Star options
__Sacrificial Fragments__ - Not a bad choice, EM mainstat is quite useful

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Elemental Mastery/Dendro DMG bonus|<circlet> Elemental Mastery/CRIT DMG or Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: All Schemes to Know
**2)** Elemental Burst: Illusory Heart
**3)** Normal Attack: Akara

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Deepwood Memories should only be ran if no other team member is currently running it, if someone else is running it, you should switch to one of the other Artifact sets.

If running a team where another member already has a significant amount of EM (such as Raiden in Hyperbloom) Nahida should run Elemental Mastery Sands, CRIT Circlet and a Dendro DMG Bonus Goblet, the only exception being Nilou Bloom. If no other team member has a significant amount of EM, Nahida should run triple EM.
